reporting-org.narrative: Fondo Centroamericano de Mujeres - FCAM (Central American Women's Fund)

title.narrative: Global Alliance for Green and Gender Action – Women Leading Climate Action

description.narrative: Strengthening the Capacity of funds, NGOs and women-led Community-based organisations to do Lobby and Advocacy on Gender-Just Climate Solutions. Solutions built on local and ancestral knowledge, and/or incorporating appropriate new and innovative methods and technologies; which centre women’s leadership, sustainability and resilience. The strategy of GAGGA is threefold: 1) STRENGTHENING local women’s leadership, resilience and capacities for collaborative and inclusive Lobby and Advocacy on gender-justice climate solutions through financial and non-financial support 2) LINKING climate, environmental and women’s rights movements 3) INFLUENCING governments, investors, and donors for gender-just climate solutions
